00031         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00032         OgreOggStreamWavSound::OgreOggStreamWavSound(const Ogre::String& name) : OgreOggISound(name)
00033         {
00034                 mStream=true;
00035                 for ( int i=0; i<NUM_BUFFERS; i++ ) mBuffers[i]=0;              
00036                 mStreamEOF=false;       
00037         }
00038         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00039         OgreOggStreamWavSound::~OgreOggStreamWavSound()
00040         {
00041                 _release();
00042                 for ( int i=0; i<NUM_BUFFERS; i++ ) mBuffers[i]=0;              
00043         }
00044         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00045         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::open(Ogre::DataStreamPtr& fileStream)
00046         {
00047                 // WAVE descriptor vars
00048                 char    id[5]={0}; 
00049                 short   format_tag;
00050                 DWORD   size; 
00051 
00052                 mAudioStream = fileStream;
00053 
00054                 // Read in "RIFF" chunk descriptor (4 bytes)
00055                 mAudioStream->read(id, 4); 
00056 
00057                 // Valid RIFF?
00058                 if (!strcmp(id, "RIFF"))
00059                 { 
00060                         // Read in chunk size (4 bytes)
00061                         mAudioStream->read(&size, 4);                                   
00062 
00063                         // Read in "WAVE" format descriptor (4 bytes)
00064                         mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                              
00065 
00066                         // Valid wav?
00067                         if (!strcmp(id,"WAVE"))
00068                         { 
00069                                 // Read in "fmt" id ( 4 bytes ) 
00070                                 mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                      
00071 
00072                                 // Read in "fmt" chunk size ( 4 bytes ) 
00073                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mFormatChunkSize, 4);
00074 
00075                                 // Should be 16 unless compressed ( compressed NOT supported )
00076                                 if ( mFormatData.mFormatChunkSize==16 )
00077                                 {
00078                                         // Read in audio format  ( 2 bytes ) 
00079                                         mAudioStream->read(&format_tag, 2);             
00080 
00081                                         // Read in num channels ( 2 bytes ) 
00082                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mNumChannels, 2);                       
00083 
00084                                         // Read in sample rate ( 4 bytes ) 
00085                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mSampleRate, 4);                
00086 
00087                                         // Read in byte rate ( 4 bytes ) 
00088                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mAvgBytesPerSec, 4);    
00089 
00090                                         // Read in byte align ( 2 bytes ) 
00091                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mBlockAlign, 2);                
00092 
00093                                         // Read in bits per sample ( 2 bytes ) 
00094                                         mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mBitsPerSample, 2);     
00095 
00096                                         // Read in "data" chunk id ( 4 bytes ) 
00097                                         mAudioStream->read(id, 4);                                      
00098 
00099                                         // Check for 'data ' or 'fact ' chunk
00100                                         if ( !strcmp(id, "data") )
00101                                         {
00102                                                 // Read in size of audio data ( 4 bytes ) 
00103                                                 mAudioStream->read(&mFormatData.mDataSize, 4);          
00104 
00105                                                 // Store byte offset of start of audio data
00106                                                 mFormatData.mAudioOffset = static_cast<DWORD>(mAudioStream->tell());
00107                                         }
00108                                         else
00109                                         {
00110                                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - No 'data' chunk!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00111                                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00112                                         }
00113                                 }
00114                                 else
00115                                 {
00116                                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Compressed WAVE files not supported!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00117                                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00118                                 }
00119                         }
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Not a valid WAVE file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00123                                 throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 else
00127                 {
00128                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStreamWavSound::open() - Not a vlid RIFF file!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00129                         throw std::string("WAVE load fail!");
00130                 }
00131 
00132 
00133                 // Upload to XRAM buffers if available
00134                 if ( OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().hasXRamSupport() )
00135                         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().setXRamBuffer(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00136 
00137                 // Set format
00138                 if(mFormatData.mNumChannels==1)
00139                 {
00140                         if(mFormatData.mBitsPerSample==16)
00141                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00142                         else
00143                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO8;
00144                 }
00145                 else
00146                 {
00147                         if(mFormatData.mBitsPerSample==16)
00148                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00149                         else
00150                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO8;
00151                 }
00152 
00153                 alGenBuffers(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00154         }
00155         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00156         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_release()
00157         {               
00158                 ALuint src=AL_NONE;
00159                 setSource(src);
00160                 alDeleteBuffers(NUM_BUFFERS, mBuffers);
00161         }
00162         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00163         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_prebuffer()
00164         {       
00165                 if (mSource==AL_NONE) return;
00166 
00167                 int i=0;
00168                 while ( i<NUM_BUFFERS )
00169                 {
00170                         if ( _stream(mBuffers[i]) ) 
00171                                 alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &mBuffers[i++]);
00172                         else
00173                                 break;
00174                 }
00175         }
00176         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00177         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::setSource(ALuint& src)
00178         {
00179                 if (src!=AL_NONE)
00180                 {
00181                         // Set source
00182                         mSource=src;
00183 
00184                         // Fill data buffers
00185                         _prebuffer();
00186 
00187                         // Init source
00188                         _initSource();
00189                 }
00190                 else
00191                 {                       
00192                         // Unqueue buffers
00193                         _dequeue();
00194 
00195                         // Set source
00196                         mSource=src;
00197                 }
00198         }
00199         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00200         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_updateAudioBuffers()
00201         {       
00202                 if(mSource == AL_NONE || !mPlay) return;        
00203 
00204                 ALenum state;    
00205                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state); 
00206 
00207                 if (state == AL_STOPPED)
00208                 {
00209                         if(mStreamEOF)
00210                         {
00211                                 stop();
00212                                 // Finished callback
00213                                 if ( mFinishedCB && mFinCBEnabled ) 
00214                                         mFinishedCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00215                                 return;
00216                         }
00217                         else 
00218                         {
00219                                 alSourcePlay(mSource);  
00220                         }
00221                 }       
00222 
00223                 int processed;
00224 
00225                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &processed);
00226 
00227                 while(processed--)
00228                 {
00229                         ALuint buffer;          
00230 
00231                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);                  
00232                         if ( _stream(buffer) ) alSourceQueueBuffers(mSource, 1, &buffer);               
00233                 }       
00234         }
00235         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00236         bool OgreOggStreamWavSound::_stream(ALuint buffer)
00237         {
00238                 std::vector<char> audioData;
00239                 char data[BUFFER_SIZE];         
00240                 int  bytes = 0;
00241                 int  result = 0;        
00242 
00243                 // Read only what was asked for
00244                 while(static_cast<int>(audioData.size()) < BUFFER_SIZE)
00245                 {
00246                         // Read up to a buffer's worth of data
00247                         bytes = static_cast<int>(mAudioStream->read(data, BUFFER_SIZE));
00248                         // EOF check
00249                         if (mAudioStream->eof()) 
00250                         {
00251                                 // If set to loop wrap to start of stream
00252                                 if ( mLoop )
00253                                 {
00254                                         mAudioStream->seek(mFormatData.mAudioOffset);
00265                                         if ( mLoopCB && mLoopCBEnabled )
00266                                                 mLoopCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00267                                 }
00268                                 else
00269                                 {
00270                                         mStreamEOF=true;
00271                                         // EOF - finish.
00272                                         if (bytes==0) break;
00273                                 }
00274                         }
00275                         // Append to end of buffer
00276                         audioData.insert(audioData.end(), data, data + bytes);
00277                         // Keep track of read data
00278                         result+=bytes;
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 // EOF
00282                 if(result == 0) return false;
00283 
00284                 alGetError();
00285                 // Copy buffer data
00286                 alBufferData(buffer, mFormat, &audioData[0], static_cast<ALsizei>(audioData.size()), mFormatData.mSampleRate);
00287 
00288                 return true;
00289         }
00290         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00291         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::_dequeue()
00292         {               
00293                 if(mSource == AL_NONE)
00294                         return;
00295                 
00296                 int queued=0;
00297 
00298                 alGetError();
00299 
00300                 // Stop source to allow unqueuing
00301                 alSourceStop(mSource);
00302 
00303                 // Get number of buffers queued on source
00304                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFERS_PROCESSED, &queued);
00305 
00306                 // Remove number of buffers from source
00307                 if (queued) 
00308                 {
00309                         alSourceUnqueueBuffers(mSource, queued, mBuffers);
00310 
00311                         // Any problems?
00312                         if ( alGetError() ) Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** Unable to unqueue buffers");
00313                 }
00314         }
00315         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00316         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::pause()
00317         {               
00318                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00319                 {
00320                         alSourcePause(mSource);
00321                 }
00322         }
00323         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00324         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::play()
00325         {       
00326                 if(isPlaying()) return;
00327 
00328                 // Grab a source if not already attached
00329                 if (mSource == AL_NONE)
00330                         if ( !OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().requestSoundSource(this) )
00331                                 return;
00332         
00333                 // Set play flag
00334                 mPlay = true;
00335 
00336                 // Play source
00337                 alSourcePlay(mSource);  
00338                 if ( alGetError() ) Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Unable to play sound");
00339         }
00340         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00341         void OgreOggStreamWavSound::stop()
00342         {
00343                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00344                 {
00345                         // Remove audio data from source
00346                         _dequeue();
00347 
00348                         // Reset stream pointer
00349                         mAudioStream->seek(mFormatData.mAudioOffset);
00350 
00351                         // Reload audio data
00352                         _prebuffer();
00353 
00354                         // Stop playback
00355                         mPlay=false;
00356 
00357                         // Give up source immediately if specfied
00358                         if (mGiveUpSource) OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().releaseSoundSource(this);
00359                 }
00360         }
00361 }
